com.viaoa.jfc

Class OADateComboBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JComboBox
            • com.viaoa.jfc.OACustomComboBox
              • com.viaoa.jfc.OADateComboBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJFCComponent, OATableComponent, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ListDataListener

    public class OADateComboBox
extends OACustomComboBox
    ComboBox that has a calendar component display for the dropdown component.

    Example:
    Create a ComboBox with popup calendar that is bound to the hire date for a Hub of Employee objects, with a width the size of 14 characters. 

            OADateComboBox dcbo = new OADateChooser(hub, "dateProperty", 14);

        // unbound to an object property
        OADateComboBox dcbo = new OADateComboBox() {
            public void setSelectedItem(Object obj) {
                OADate date = (OADate) obj;
                super.setSelectedItem(date);
                // ...
            }
        };

        // using a TextField as an editor
        OADateComboBox dcbo = new OADateComboBox(hub, "dateProperty", 16);
        txt = new OATextField(hub, "dateProperty", 15);
        dcbo.setEditor(txt);

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    OADateComboBox, Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        columns - is width to use, using average character width
